<!doctype html><html lang=en><meta charset=utf-8><meta content=width=device-width,initial-scale=1.0 name=viewport><meta name=description><meta content="iterate GmbH" name=author><meta content=1Wgv1h7B1ehNr5VEsM0p-pFzM4nxYS1yJuKhbT2LTe4 name=google-site-verification><link rel="shortcut icon" href=//cdn.cyberduck.io/img/cyberduck-icon-rect-32.png type=image/png><script src=https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/jquery/3.7.1/jquery.min.js></script><link href=https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/twitter-bootstrap/3.4.1/css/bootstrap.min.css rel=stylesheet><script src=https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/twitter-bootstrap/3.4.1/js/bootstrap.min.js></script><link href=/css/custom.css rel=stylesheet><script src=//cdn.cyberduck.io/js/ga.js></script><script>var track=(a=>{ga(`send`,`event`,`outbound`,`click`,a,{'transport':`beacon`,'hitCallback':(()=>{document.location=a})})})</script><script src=//cdn.cyberduck.io/js/custom.js></script><script src=//cdn.cyberduck.io/js/jquery.form.min.js></script><script>$((()=>{$(`[data-toggle="tooltip"]`).tooltip()}))</script><script async src=https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtag/js?id=G-069T53PG29></script><script>function gtag(){dataLayer.push(arguments)}window.dataLayer=window.dataLayer||[];gtag(`js`,new Date());gtag(`config`,`G-069T53PG29`)</script><title>Cyberduck | Libre server and cloud storage browser for Mac and

            OneDrive, Google Drive and Dropbox</title><link href=//cdn.cyberduck.io/css/style.aw-showcase.css rel=stylesheet><script src=//cdn.cyberduck.io/js/jquery.aw-showcase.min.js></script><title>Cyberduck | Libre server and cloud storage browser for Mac and
            Windows with support for FTP, SFTP, WebDAV, Amazon S3, OpenStack Swift, Backblaze B2, Microsoft Azure &
            OneDrive, Google Drive and Dropbox</title><body><header class=index><div class=container><br><div class="alert alert-info alert-dismissable"><button aria-hidden=true class=close </a></div><div class=media-body><p class=text-center>Download <strong>Mountain Duck</strong> available from <strong><a href=https://mountainduck.io/>mountainduck.io</a></strong> to mount any remote server storage as a local disk in the Finder.app on <strong>Mac</strong> and the File Explorer on <strong>Windows</strong>.</div></div></div><p class=help-block></p><script async src=//pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js></script><ins class=adsbygoogle data-ad-client=ca-pub-9176652804694766 data-ad-format=auto data-ad-slot=6970272741 style=display:block></ins><script>(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({})</script></div><div class=container><nav class="navbar navbar-default" role=navigation><div class=navbar-header><button type=button>Protocols <span class=caret></span></button> <ul aria-labelledby=protocols-dropdown class=dropdown-menu><li><a href=/ftp>FTP</a><li><a href=/sftp>SFTP</a><li><a href=/dracoon>DRACOON</a><li><a href=/files.com>Files.com</a><li class=divider role=separator><li><a href=/spectra>Spectra BlackPearl</a><li><a href=/irods>iRODS</a><li class=divider class=navbar-link href=/donate> <button class="btn btn-success navbar-btn" data-original-title="Receive a donation key that registers the installed application to your name and disables the donation prompt." data-container=body data-placement=bottom rel=tooltip>Donate</button> </a></ul></div></nav></div><div class=jumbotron><div class=container><div class=row><div class=col-sm-4><div class=text-center><img class=img-responsive height=384 src=//cdn.cyberduck.io/img/cyberduck-icon-384.png title=Cyberduck width=384><br><br><p><a class="btn btn-default btn-lg" href=/download style=width:260px title=Download> <span class="glyphicon glyphicon-download-alt" aria-hidden=true></span> <strong>Download</strong><br> <span>for macOS or Windows</span> </a><p><a href=/windowsstore> <img alt="Cyberduck on Windows App Store" class=img-rounded src=//cdn.cyberduck.io/img/windowsstore/badge.en.svg style=width:260px> </a><p><a href=/appstore> <img alt="Cyberduck on Mac App Store" src=//cdn.cyberduck.io/img/macappstore/badge.en.svg style=width:260px> </a></div></div><div class=col-sm-8><div class=page-header><h2>Cyberduck is a libre server and cloud storage browser for Mac and Windows with support for <strong>FTP</strong>, <strong>SFTP</strong>, <strong>WebDAV</strong>, <strong>Amazon S3</strong>, <strong>OpenStack Swift</strong>, <strong>Backblaze B2</strong>, <strong>Microsoft Azure & OneDrive</strong>, <strong>Google Drive</strong> and <strong>Dropbox</strong>.</h2></div><div class=showcase id=screenshots><div class=showcase-slide><div class=showcase-content><img alt=Bookmarks class=img-responsive src=//cdn.cyberduck.io/img/mac/browser-bookmarks.png width=650px></div><div class=showcase-thumbnail><img alt=Thumbnail height=125px src=//cdn.cyberduck.io/img/mac/browser-bookmarks-thumb.png width=140px><div class=showcase-thumbnail-cover></div></div></div><div class=showcase-slide><div class=showcase-content><img alt=Browser class=img-responsive src=//cdn.cyberduck.io/img/mac/browser.png width=650px></div><div class=showcase-thumbnail><img alt=Thumbnail src=//cdn.cyberduck.io/img/mac/browser-thumb.png width=140px><div class=showcase-thumbnail-cover></div></div></div><div class=showcase-slide><div class=showcase-content><img alt=Bookmarks class=img-responsive src=//cdn.cyberduck.io/img/windows/browser-bookmarks.png width=600px></div><div class=showcase-thumbnail><img alt=Thumbnail src=//cdn.cyberduck.io/img/windows/browser-bookmarks-thumb.png width=140px><div class=showcase-thumbnail-cover></div></div></div><div class=showcase-slide><div class=showcase-content><img alt=Browser class=img-responsive src=//cdn.cyberduck.io/img/windows/browser.png width=600px></div><div class=showcase-thumbnail><img alt=Thumbnail src=//cdn.cyberduck.io/img/windows/browser-thumb.png width=140px><div class=showcase-thumbnail-cover></div></div></div></div><script>$(document).ready((()=>{let a=0;selected=a;if(navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase().indexOf(`windows`)>-1){selected=2};$(`#screenshots`).awShowcase({selected:selected,auto:!1,interval:3000,continuous:!1,loading:!0,arrows:!1,buttons:!1,mousetrace:!1,pauseonover:!0,transition:`fade`,transition_speed:400,show_caption:`onhover`,thumbnails:!0,thumbnails_position:`outside-last`,thumbnails_direction:`vertical`,thumbnails_slidex:a})}))</script></div></div></div></div></header><section id=content><section id=products><div class=container><div style="margin:10px 0"><a title="Browse with Cyberduck on macOS and Windows" href=https://cyberduck.io/><span class="label label-default"><img alt=Cyberduck height=16px src=//cdn.cyberduck.io/img/cyberduck-icon-60.png> Cyberduck</span> </a><a title="Mount to your desktop with Mountain Duck" href=https://mountainduck.io/><span class="label label-default"><img alt="Mountain Duck" height=16px src=https://cdn.mountainduck.io/images/mountainduck_y_64.png> Mountain Duck</span> </a><a title="Access using the command line interface on Linux, macOS and Windows with Cyberduck CLI" href=https://duck.sh/> <span class="label label-default"><img alt="Cyberduck CLI" height=16px src=//cdn.cyberduck.io/img/cli32.png> CLI</span> </a></div></div></section><section id=protocols><div class=container><h2 class=headline>Connecting to every server. <small>With an easy-to-use interface, connect to servers, enterprise file sharing and cloud storage. You can find <a href=/profiles>connection profiles</a> for popular hosting service providers. </small></h2><p class=help-block><div class=row><div class=col-sm-4><a class=img-thumbnail href=/ftp> <div class=media><div class=media-left><img class="media-object img-responsive" src=//cdn.cyberduck.io/img/ftp.png width=128px></div><div class=media-body><h3 class=media-heading><strong>FTP</strong></h3><p><span>A widely tested FTP (File Transfer Protocol) implementation for the best interoperability with support for FTP over secured SSL/TLS connections.</span></div></div> </a><a class=img-thumbnail href=/sftp> <div class=media><div class=media-left></div><div class=media-body><h3 class=media-heading><strong>SFTP</strong></h3><p><span>With support for strong ciphers, public key and two factor authentication. Read settings from your existing OpenSSH configuration.</span></div></div> </a><a class=img-thumbnail href=/webdav> <div class=media><div class=media-left></div><div class=media-body><h3 class=media-heading><strong>WebDAV</strong></h3><p><span>With interoperability for ownCloud, box.com, Sharepoint and BigCommerce and many other WebDAV servers. TLS mutual (two-way) authentication with client certificate.</span></div></div> </a><a class=img-thumbnail href=/smb> <div class=media><div class=media-left></div><div class=media-body><h3 class=media-heading><strong>SMB</strong></h3><p><span>Access Windows File Shares or a Samba Linux Server.</span></div></div> </a><a class=img-thumbnail href=/openstack> <div class=media><div class=media-left><img class="media-object img-responsive" src=//cdn.cyberduck.io/img/swift.png width=128px></div><div class=media-body><h3 class=media-heading><strong>OpenStack Swift</strong></h3><p>Connect to Rackspace Cloudfiles or any other OpenStack Swift cloud storage providers.</div></div> </a><a class=img-thumbnail href=/googlestorage> <div class=media><div class=media-left><img class="media-object img-responsive" src=//cdn.cyberduck.io/img/googlestorage.png width=128px></div><div class=media-body><h3 class=media-heading><strong>Google Cloud Storage</strong></h3><p>Connect to buckets in Google Cloud Storage and configure as a website endpoint.</div></div> </a></div><div class=col-sm-4><a class=img-thumbnail href=/s3> <div class=media><div class=media-left><img class="media-object img-responsive" src=//cdn.cyberduck.io/img/s3.png width=128px></div><div class=media-body><h3 class=media-heading><strong>S3</strong></h3><p>Connect to any Amazon S3 storage region with support for large file uploads.</div></div> </a><a class=img-thumbnail href=/azure> <div class=media><div class=media-left><img class="media-object img-responsive" src=//cdn.cyberduck.io/img/azure.png width=128px></div><div class=media-body><h3 class=media-heading><strong>Azure</strong></h3><p>Access Microsoft Azure Cloud storage on your desktop.</div></div> </a><a class=img-thumbnail href=/backblaze> <div class=media><div class=media-left><img class="media-object img-responsive" src=//cdn.cyberduck.io/img/b2.png width=128px></div><div class=media-body><h3 class=media-heading><strong>Backblaze B2</strong></h3><p>Mount the low cost cloud storage on your desktop.</div></div> </a><a class=img-thumbnail href=/dracoon> <div class=media><div class=media-left><img class="media-object img-responsive" src=//cdn.cyberduck.io/img/providers/dracoon.png width=128px></div><div class=media-body><h3 class=media-heading><strong>DRACOON</strong></h3><span class="label label-danger">Version 6</span><p>Enterprise cloud service made in Germany.</div></div> </a><a class=img-thumbnail href=/box> <div class=media><div class=media-left><img class="media-object img-responsive" src=//cdn.cyberduck.io/img/providers/box.png width=128px></div><div class=media-body><h3 class=media-heading><strong>Box</strong></h3><span class="label label-danger">Version 8.2</span><p>Leading organizations secure their data with Box.</div></div> </a><a class=img-thumbnail href=/nextcloud> <div class=media><div class=media-left><img class="media-object img-responsive" src=//cdn.cyberduck.io/img/nextcloud.png width=128px></div><div class=media-body><h3 class=media-heading><strong>Nextcloud</strong></h3><span class="label label-danger">Version 7</span><p>Connect to your own on-premise Nextcloud installation with ease.<p>Create share links and view and revert previous versions.</div></div> </a></div><div class=col-sm-4><a class=img-thumbnail href=/googledrive> <div class=media><div class=media-left><img class="media-object img-responsive" src=//cdn.cyberduck.io/img/googledrive.png width=128px></div><div class=media-body><h3 class=media-heading><strong>Google Drive</strong></h3><p>Access Google Drive without synchronising documents to your local disk. With URL reference files on mounted volume to open Google Docs documents in the web browser.</div></div> </a><a class=img-thumbnail href=/dropbox> <div class=media><div class=media-left><img class="media-object img-responsive" src=//cdn.cyberduck.io/img/dropbox.png width=128px></div><div class=media-body><h3 class=media-heading><strong>Dropbox</strong></h3><p>Access Dropbox without synchronising documents to your local disk.</div></div> </a><a class=img-thumbnail href=/onedrive> <div class=media><div class=media-left><img class="media-object img-responsive" src=//cdn.cyberduck.io/img/onedrive.png width=128px></div><div class=media-body><h3 class=media-heading><strong>OneDrive</strong></h3><span class="label label-danger">Version 6</span><p>Connect OneDrive Personal, OneDrive Business and Sharepoint Online.</div></div> </a><a class=img-thumbnail href=/files.com> <div class=media><div class=media-left><img class="media-object img-responsive" src=//cdn.cyberduck.io/img/providers/files.com.png width=128px></div><div class=media-body><h3 class=media-heading><strong>Files.com</strong></h3><span class="label label-danger">Version 7</span><p>Fast, affordable, and available in 7 worldwide regions.</div></div> </a><a class=img-thumbnail href=/owncloud> <div class=media><div class=media-left><img class="media-object img-responsive" src=//cdn.cyberduck.io/img/owncloud.png width=128px></div><div class=media-body><h3 class=media-heading><strong>ownCloud</strong></h3><span class="label label-danger">Version 7</span><p>Support for ownCloud Infinite Scale with authentication using OpenID Connect.<p>Create share links and view and revert previous versions.</div></div> </a></div></div></div></section><section id=cryptomator><div class=container><div class=media><div class=media-body><h2 class=headline>Cryptomator. <small>Client side encryption with <a href=/cryptomator>Cryptomator</a> interoperable vaults to secure your data on any server or cloud storage. <span class="label label-danger">Version 6</span></small></h2><div class=row><div class=col-md-4><p><span class="glyphicon glyphicon-ok-sign" aria-hidden=true></span> <strong>Filename Encryption</strong><br> File and directory names are encrypted, directory structures are obfuscated.</div><div class=col-md-4><p><span class="glyphicon glyphicon-ok-sign" aria-hidden=true></span> <strong>File Content Encryption</strong><br> Every file gets encrypted individually.</div><div class=col-md-4><p><span class="glyphicon glyphicon-ok-sign" aria-hidden=true></span> <strong>Secure and Trustworthy with Open Source</strong><br> No backdoors. No registration or account required.</div></div></div><div class=media-right><img src=//cdn.cyberduck.io/img/cryptomator_256.png width=256px></div></div></div></section><section id=features><div class=container><h2 class=headline><img class=headline height=32px src=//cdn.cyberduck.io/img/pencil.png width=32px> Edit any file with your preferred editor. <small> To edit files, a seamless integration with any external editor application makes it easy to change content quickly. Edit any text or binary file on the server in your preferred application. </small></h2></div><div class=container><h2 class=headling>Share files. <small></small></h2><div class=row><div class=col-md-4><p><span class="glyphicon glyphicon-ok-sign" aria-hidden=true></span> <strong>Web URL</strong><br> Quickly copy or open the corresponding HTTP URLs of a selected file in your web browser. Includes CDN and pre-signed URLs for S3.</div><div class=col-md-4></div><div class=col-md-4></div></div></div><div class=container><h2 class=headline>Distribute your content in the cloud. <small>Both <a href=https://trac.cyberduck.io/wiki/help/en/howto/cloudfront>Amazon CloudFront</a> and <a href=https://trac.cyberduck.io/wiki/help/en/howto/akamai>Akamai</a> content delivery networks (<a href=https://trac.cyberduck.io/wiki/help/en/howto/cdn>CDN</a>) can be easily configured to distribute your files worldwide from edge locations. Connect to any server using FTP, SFTP or WebDAV and configure it as the origin of a new <a href=https://trac.cyberduck.io/wiki/help/en/howto/cloudfront>Amazon CloudFront</a> CDN distribution. </small></h2><div class=row><div class=col-md-4><p><span class="glyphicon glyphicon-ok-sign" aria-hidden=true></span> <strong>Amazon CloudFront</strong><br> Manage custom origin, basic and streaming <a href=https://trac.cyberduck.io/wiki/help/en/howto/cloudfront>CloudFront</a> distributions. Toggle deployment, define CNAMEs, distribution access logging and set the default index file.</div></div><h2 class=headline>First class bookmarking. <small> Organize your bookmarks with drag and drop and quickly search using the filter field. </small></h2><div class=row><div class=col-md-4><p><span class="glyphicon glyphicon-ok-sign" aria-hidden=true></span> <strong>Files</strong><br> Drag and drop bookmarks to the Finder.app and drop files onto bookmarks to upload.<p><span class="glyphicon glyphicon-ok-sign" aria-hidden=true></span> <strong>Spotlight</strong><br> <a href=https://trac.cyberduck.io/wiki/help/en/howto/spotlight>Spotlight</a> Importer for bookmark files.</div><div class=col-md-4><p><span class="glyphicon glyphicon-ok-sign" aria-hidden=true></span> <strong>History</strong><br> History of visited servers with timestamp of last access.</div><div class=col-md-4><p><span class="glyphicon glyphicon-ok-sign" aria-hidden=true></span> <strong>Import</strong><br> <a href=https://trac.cyberduck.io/wiki/help/en/howto/bookmarks#Fromthird-partyapplications>Import Bookmarks</a> from third-party applications.</div></div><h2 class=headline>Browse with ease. <small>Browse and move your files quickly in the browser with caching enabled for the best performance. Works with any character encoding for the correct display of Umlaute, Japanese and Chinese. </small></h2><div class=row><div class=col-md-4><span class="glyphicon glyphicon-ok-sign" aria-hidden=true></span><strong>Quick Look</strong><p>Quickly preview files with Quick Look. Press the space key to preview files like in Finder.app without explicitly downloading.</div><div class=col-md-4><span class="glyphicon glyphicon-ok-sign" aria-hidden=true></span><strong>Accessible</strong><p>The outline view of the browser allows to browse large folder structures efficiently. Cut & paste or drag & drop files to organize.</div><div class=col-md-4></div></div><h2 class=headline>Transfer anything. <small>Limit the number of concurrent transfers and filter files using a regular expression. Resume both interrupted download and uploads. Recursively transfer directories. </small></h2><div class=row><div class=col-md-4><span class="glyphicon glyphicon-ok-sign" aria-hidden=true></span><strong>Download and Upload</strong><p>Drag and drop to and from the browser to download and upload.</div><div class=col-md-4><span class="glyphicon glyphicon-ok-sign" aria-hidden=true></span><strong>Copy</strong><p>Copy files directly between servers.</div><div class=col-md-4><span class="glyphicon glyphicon-ok-sign" aria-hidden=true></span><strong>Synchronization</strong><p>Synchronize local with remote directories (and vice versa) and get a preview of affected files before any action is taken.</div></div><h2 class=headline>Integration with system technologies. <small>A native citizen of Mac OS X and Windows. Notification center, Gatekeeper and Retina resolution. </small></h2><div class=row><div class=col-md-4><span class="glyphicon glyphicon-ok-sign" aria-hidden=true></span><strong>Keychain</strong><p>All passwords are stored in the system Keychain as Internet passwords available also to third party applications. Certificates are validated using the trust settings in the Keychain.</p><span class="glyphicon glyphicon-ok-sign" aria-hidden=true></span><strong>Bonjour</strong><p>Auto discovery of FTP & WebDAV services on the local network.</div><div class=col-md-4><span class="glyphicon glyphicon-ok-sign" aria-hidden=true></span><strong>Finder</strong><p>Use Cyberduck as default system wide protocol handler for FTP and SFTP. Open <code>.inetloc</code> files and <code>.duck</code> bookmark files from the Finder.</p><span class="glyphicon glyphicon-ok-sign" aria-hidden=true></span><strong>Notifications</strong><p>Notifications in system tray (Windows) and the Notification Center (Mac).</div><div class=col-md-4><span class="glyphicon glyphicon-ok-sign" aria-hidden=true></span><strong>Windows</strong><p>Reads your proxy configuration from network settings. Encrypts passwords limiting access to your account.</div></div></div></section><section id=open><div class=container><h2 class=headline>We are open. <small>Licensed under the <a href=http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl.html>GPL</a>. </small></h2><p>Come in. You can follow the daily development activity, have a look at the roadmap and grab the source code on <a href=https://github.com/iterate-ch/cyberduck>GitHub</a>. We contribute to other open source projects including <a href=https://github.com/iterate-ch/java-openstack-swift>OpenStack Swift Client Java Bindings</a>, <a href=https://github.com/iterate-ch/rococoa>Rococoa Objective-C Wrapper</a> and <a href=https://github.com/iterate-ch/sshj>SSHJ</a>.<h2 class=headline>International. <small>Speaks your language.</small></h2><p>English, ƒçe≈°tina, Nederlands, Suomi, Fran√ßais, Deutsch, Italiano, Êó•Êú¨Ë™û, ÌïúÍµ≠Ïñ¥, Norsk, Slovenƒçina, Espa√±ol, Portugu√™s (do Brasil), Portugu√™s (Europeu), ‰∏≠Êñá (ÁÆÄ‰Ωì), Ê≠£È´î‰∏≠Êñá (ÁπÅÈ´î), –†—É—Å—Å–∫–∏–π, Svenska, Dansk, Jƒôzyk Polski, Magyar, Bahasa Indonesia, Catal√†, Cymraeg, ‡∏†‡∏≤‡∏©‡∏≤‡πÑ‡∏ó‡∏¢, T√ºrk√ße, Ivrit, Latvie≈°u Valoda, ŒïŒªŒªŒ∑ŒΩŒπŒ∫Œ¨, C—Ä–ø—Å–∫–∏, ·É•·Éê·É†·Éó·É£·Éö·Éò ·Éî·Éú·Éê, Sloven≈°ƒçina, —É–∫—Ä–∞—ó–Ω—Å—å–∫–∞ –º–æ–≤–∞, Rom√¢nƒÉ, Hrvatski & –ë—ä–ª–≥–∞—Ä—Å–∫–∏ –µ–∑–∏–∫.</div></section></section><section id=social><div class=container><h2>Follow Us!</h2><div class=row><div class=col-md-6><div class=well><h3>Newsletter</h3><p>You can subscribe to the <a href=https://lists.cyberduck.io/mailman/listinfo/cyberduck-news>Cyberduck-news</a> mailing list to get a notification when a new version is released.<form
